order_details.time_in_force: day, gtc, opg, cls, ioc, fok

comments.timestamp: ISO 8601 formatted date and time when the play was created or last updated
comments.status: Current status of the play (e.g., pending, active, closed)
comments.strategy: Name of the strategy being employed (e.g., Options Swing)
comments.ticker: Ticker symbol of the underlying asset (e.g., AAPL, META)
comments.trade_type: Type of option being traded: CALL or PUT
comments.market_context: Market conditions or context (e.g., Trading Range, Daily Gap Level)
comments.entry_point: Price at which the trade should be entered

order_details.type: Type of order (limit, market, stop, stop_limit, trailing_stop)
order_details.time_in_force: How long the order should remain active (day, gtc, opg, cls, ioc, fok)
order_details.stop_price: Required for stop or stop_limit orders
order_details.trail_price: For trailing stop orders, the fixed dollar amount
order_details.trail_percent: For trailing stop orders, the percentage
order_details.extended_hours: If true, order is eligible to execute in premarket/afterhours
order_details.client_order_id: Unique identifier for the order, optional
order_details.order_class: Type of order class (simple, oco, oto, bracket)

take_profit: Defines take-profit levels; TP1, TP2, etc.

take_profit.order_type: Type of order for taking profit (market or limit)
take_profit.price: Price at which to take profit
take_profit.contracts: Number of contracts to sell at this point

stop_loss.price: Price at which the position should be closed to prevent further loss
stop_loss.contracts: Number of contracts affected by the stop-loss
